import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create an extension"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/domains/{domain_uuid}/extensions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new extension in the specified domain.

Notes:
- Some fields are defaulted server-side (e.g., effective caller-id, voicemail defaults) based on your internal request logic.
- Returns the created extension object.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"domain_uuid","description":"The domain UUID.","example":"4018f7a3-8e0a-47bb-9f4f-04b1313e0e1b","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"directory_first_name":{"type":"string","description":"Directory first name. Must not be greater than 60 characters.","example":"Front"},"directory_last_name":{"type":"string","description":"Directory last name. Must not be greater than 60 characters.","example":"Desk"},"effective_caller_id_name":{"type":"string","description":"","example":null},"effective_caller_id_number":{"type":"string","description":"","example":null},"extension":{"type":"number","description":"Extension number.","example":1001},"voicemail_mail_to":{"type":"string","description":"Optional voicemail-to-email address. Must be a valid email address. Must not be greater than 255 characters.","example":"frontdesk@example.com"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Optional label/description for the extension. Must not be greater than 255 characters.","example":"Main reception phone"},"user_context":{"type":"string","description":"Must not be greater than 255 characters.","example":"xpuqzwaoumglfmdwciw"},"accountcode":{"type":"string","description":"Must not be greater than 255 characters.","example":"c"},"domain_uuid":{"type":"string","description":"Must be a valid UUID.","example":"e6228d9d-ed95-3b2d-9def-d30844a9bbce"},"password":{"type":"string","description":"Must be at least 6 characters. Must not be greater than 255 characters.","example":"i'}|.uY.~"},"directory_visible":{"type":"string","description":"Whether the user appears in the directory. Accepts true/false/1/0.","example":"true","enum":["true","false","1","0"]},"directory_exten_visible":{"type":"string","description":"Whether the extension number is visible in the directory. Accepts true/false/1/0.","example":"true","enum":["true","false","1","0"]},"voicemail_enabled":{"type":"string","description":"Whether voicemail is enabled. Accepts true/false/1/0.","example":"true","enum":["true","false","1","0"]},"voicemail_transcription_enabled":{"type":"string","description":"Whether voicemail transcription is enabled. Accepts true/false/1/0.","example":"true","enum":["true","false","1","0"]},"voicemail_recording_instructions":{"type":"string","description":"Whether voicemail recording instructions are enabled. Accepts true/false/1/0.","example":"true","enum":["true","false","1","0"]},"voicemail_file":{"type":"string","description":"Voicemail delivery mode/file type (e.g. attach). Must not be greater than 16 characters.","example":"attach"},"voicemail_local_after_email":{"type":"string","description":"Whether to keep voicemail local after emailing. Accepts true/false/1/0.","example":"true","enum":["true","false","1","0"]},"voicemail_tutorial":{"type":"string","description":"Whether voicemail tutorial is enabled. Accepts true/false/1/0.","example":"true","enum":["true","false","1","0"]},"voicemail_id":{"type":"string","description":"Voicemail box ID (often same as extension). Must not be greater than 60 characters.","example":"1001"},"voicemail_password":{"type":"string","description":"Voicemail PIN/password. Must not be greater than 20 characters.","example":"1001"}},"required":["directory_first_name","extension","user_context","domain_uuid","password","directory_visible","directory_exten_visible","voicemail_enabled","voicemail_transcription_enabled","voicemail_recording_instructions","voicemail_file","voicemail_local_after_email","voicemail_tutorial","voicemail_id","voicemail_password"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
